components.description:
A star with eight points, that is commonly shown in orange, and for some reason, with only four points.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
components.title: Eight Pointed Black Star

description:
A star with eight points, that is commonly shown in orange, and for some reason, with only four points.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
title: Eight Pointed Black Star

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: A star with eight points, that is commonly shown in orange, and for some reason, with only four points. See the glossary for information on  http://emojipedia.org/eight-pointed-black-star/
emoji_net_data.name: eight-pointed star

bn:00073964n: Sphere of plasma held together by gravity, undergoing fusion
A luminous celestial body that is made from gases (particularly hydrogen and helium) and forms the shape of a sphere.
This article is for quotes about stars, or which make prominent mention of stars.
(astronomy) a celestial body of hot gases that radiates energy derived from thermonuclear reactions in the interior
A star is a massive, luminous sphere of plasma held together by its own gravity.
A luminous celestial body, made up of plasma (particularly hydrogen and helium) and having a spherical shape. Depending on context the sun may or may not be included.

bn:02485403n: A regular star polygon is a regular non-convex polygon.
A concave polygon with regular, pointy protrusions and indentations, generally with five or six points.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the eight-pointed star emoji shines with a vibrant, radiant yellow, embodying a sense of wonder and brilliance. Its form features sharp, defined points that catch the light, enhanced by Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients, creating a subtle metallic sheen. This emoji on Apple devices often signifies exceptional achievement, a brilliant idea, or a particularly special moment, adding a touch of celestial magic to digital conversations.
